name: your the enemy
description:
this game was made for the Trijam #173. so that means this game is made in 3 hours only. that's why it has a lot of bugs. and the game also kinda sucks.

but the main theme of the game is that, it is a top down shooter game and instead of killing the enemies. YOU are the enemy. and have to try to kill the player by touching the player.

controls:

move up : up arrow

move down : down arrow

move left: left arrow

move right: right arrow
